FuncDef:
The nat centralized-backup auto switchover disable command disables the automatic switchback function for centralized backup of distributed CGN.
The undo nat centralized-backup auto switchover disable command restores the default configuration.
By default, the automatic switchback function for centralized backup of distributed CGN is enabled.
CLIs: undo nat centralized-backup auto switchover disable
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In centralized backup of distributed CGN, when a fault on the VSUF-80/VSUF-160/VSUI-160-E board of the BRAS is rectified, user traffic is automatically switched back to the BRAS for NAT implementation. To disable the automatic switchback function for centralized backup of distributed CGN, run the nat centralized-backup auto switchover disable command.
Prerequisites
The automatic switching and switchback function for centralized backup of distributed CGN has been enabled using the nat centralized-backup enable command.
Precautions
This command is applicable only to the VSUF-80/VSUF-160/VSUI-160-E.
